comments.author: Michael
comments.message: Thank you so much for spending the time to figure out a workaround. This issue was driving me nuts. Copying and pasting in a space and tab worked like a charm.

comments.author: CookieDough
comments.message: Tried this on a Mac using Chrome today. Copied the space+tab from your site and pasted into the textarea. Zillow changes it to a '?' upon saving. Would love any other workarounds that you know of. Thank you so much for writing his post in the first place!

comments.author: cm
comments.message: This trick doesn't seem to work anymore (Oct 2018).
